text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Brilliant! Looks like you're training
well!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I came to see how things were
progressing… I'm impressed! You're doing
a great job supporting your horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Yes ♪ Let's continue to steadily 
grow the horsegirl!
